meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unpleasant or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: The yuckiness of the spoiled milk made me gag.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand the yuckiness of slimy textures.
meanings.sent3: The yuckiness of the mushy peas made the kids scrunch up their faces.
meanings.sent4: The yuckiness of the situation left a bitter taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The yuckiness of the garbage dump was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: A feeling of disgust or revulsion.
meanings.sent1: Her face clearly showed the yuckiness she felt towards the slimy creature.
meanings.sent2: The yuckiness in my stomach grew stronger as I smelled the rotten eggs.
meanings.sent3: The yuckiness she felt towards broccoli was comical.
meanings.sent4: The yuckiness of the horror movie made me shiver.
meanings.sent5: The yuckiness in his expression was unmistakable.
